mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (id, email, password, username, nickname, phone_number, role, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{role}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE email = #{email})
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber})
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE nickname = #{nickname})

SELECT u.id, u.email, u.userName, u.nickname, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM friend f WHERE (f.requester_id = u.id OR f.receiver_id = u.id) AND f.status = 'ACCEPTED' ) AS friendCount, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_team ut WHERE ut.user_id = u.id AND ut.status = 'JOINED' ) AS teamCount, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM personal_todo pt WHERE pt.user_id = u.id ) AS todoCount
FROM users u WHERE u.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = #{email} and is_active = true
SELECT * FROM users WHERE nickName = #{nickName} AND is_active = true
